title: Oliver Heald – 2021 Comments on the Death of Ian Gibson
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Oliver Heald on 9 April 2021.
content:
Ian Gibson, Labour MP of years gone by has sadly passed away. A good MP and one prepared to make common cause across Party.
